modules.description: Handles parsing and retrieval of boot-time parameters from Unix environments, supporting key-value pairs and structured data. Operates on strings, maps, and custom record types representing system configuration. Used to pass network settings, disk images, and runtime flags from host to MirageOS unikernels.

Returns a lazy, asynchronous representation of the command-line arguments. Operates on string arrays and Lwt promises to handle environment and process arguments. Used to safely access and process startup parameters in concurrent or delayed execution contexts.
